name: Aclaris Therapeutics, Inc.
description: Aclaris Therapeutics, Inc. is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing innovative treatments for dermatological diseases and other conditions. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in Wayne, Pennsylvania, Aclaris aims to address unmet medical needs through the discovery and development of novel therapeutics. The company is known for its proprietary technology platform, which enables the rapid development of drug candidates targeting various skin disorders, including alopecia areata and actinic keratosis. Aclaris is committed to advancing its pipeline of product candidates, utilizing a combination of chemical entities and biologics. In addition to its development efforts, Aclaris engages with the dermatology community to ensure its therapies align with the needs of patients and healthcare providers. With a focus on innovation and patient-centric solutions, Aclaris Therapeutics is dedicated to transforming the treatment landscape for dermatological conditions.
